# Multivariable examples and tricks

```{r}
require(datasets)
require(GGally)
require(ggplot2)
data("swiss")
head(swiss)

g <- ggpairs(swiss, lower = list(continuous = "smooth"), params = c(mmethos = "loess"))
g

## Calling lm with ~.  fits all variables at once
summary(lm(Fertility ~ ., data = swiss))$coefficients
```
